titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation inhibiting the importation of vvhale finnes into his Maiesties dominions by any, but the Muscouy Company.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Greenwich, the eighteenth day of May, in the seuenteenth yeere of our raigne ..
Arms 11; Steele notation: Wansted, bid 2) vpon the.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
